title: RIOT DON'T LET ME RECONNECT
body:
I tryed 6/7 times to reconnect in a ranked game but LoL say me check your internet connection...
I checked and I try again but...don't want to reconnect 
I tryed and tryed but no want to reconnect
Now I lost point for? Cause LoL(RIOT) don't let me reconnect

replies.body: restart pc.When u have this problem, u can just restart computer.
